      • list

        @RequestMapping(value="/list")
@ResponseBody
public void list(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        用户发布的帖子记录列表
        返回

        {count:记录数量,
        list:[{basicId:帖子编号，basicTitlte:标题}]}

      • save

        @RequestMapping(value="/save",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void save(@ModelAttribute
                                    com.mingsoft.bbs.entity.SubjectEntity subject,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        发帖
        参数:
        rand_code - 验证码
        subject - subject参数包含字段信息参考：
        basicTitle 标题 6到70个字
        subjectContent 内容
        basicCategoryId 论坛版本id
        返回

        {code:"错误编码",
        result:"true｜false",
        resultMsg:"错误信息"
        }

      • edit

        @RequestMapping(value="/{basicId}/detail",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void edit(@PathVariable
                                    int basicId,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        读取帖子信息
        参数:
        basicId - 帖子编号 subject参数包含字段信息参考：
        basicTitle 标题 6到70个字
        subjectContent 内容
        basicCategoryId 论坛版本id
        返回

        {basicTitle:标题,subjectContent:帖子内容,basicCategoryId:板块分类}

@ResponseBody
public void update(@ModelAttribute
